quote.issuer_name: Xinjiang Tianye Water Saving Irrigation System Co Ltd -H Shs
quote.nm: Xinjiang Tianye Water Saving Irrigation System Co Ltd -H Shs
quote.summary: Xinjiang Tianye Water Saving Irrigation System Co Ltd is a China-based investment holding company that is primarily engaged in the manufacturing and sales of irrigation systems and equipment. The Company operates in two segments: Water-saving Products segment and Trade Income segment. The Company's main business includes designing, manufacturing and selling drip irrigation tapes and drip irrigation accessories, polyethylene (PE) pipes and polyvinyl chloride (PVC) pipes, as well as providing installation services. The Company is also engaged in land transfer and engineering business. Its drip irrigation tape products include single-wing labyrinth drip irrigation tape, inlaid drip irrigation tape and large flow compensation drip irrigation tape. The Company mainly conducts its business in the domestic market.
